comments:
Using WTP 1.0 RC1, I opened an XML schema that contained parameter entities. I'll attach the file.

Created an attachment (id=31398)
Main XSD That includes parameter entities

Created an attachment (id=31399)
Entities included by XSD

Created an attachment (id=31401)
Secondary XML file

The Outline view displays: 

Unable to create view: An unexpected exception was thrown.

I tried many times, but could not reproduce the problem. Besides, I got another NullPointerException as List 2, and could not reproduce it either. Therefore, I reviewed the code and had a suggestion that may help fix this kind of unrepeatable problem.

A statement like ?getObject().callAMethod()? is under assumption that the ?getObject()? can not return null. However, some ?getObject()? may return  null. That leads to NullPointerException. The code as List 1 may cause the bug#119931.

Therefore, I suggest, review the statement like ?getObject().callAMethod()?, and make sure ?getObject()? method can not return null. 


List. 1
       {
            boolean initialRef = getXSDEditor().getXSDModelAdapterFactory().getShowReferences();   
            . . .
       }

	private XSDEditor getXSDEditor() {
		if (fEditor == null) {
			IWorkbench workbench = PlatformUI.getWorkbench();
			if (workbench != null) {
				IWorkbenchWindow window = workbench.getActiveWorkbenchWindow();
				if (window != null) {
					IWorkbenchPage page = window.getActivePage();
					if (page != null) {
						IEditorPart editor = page.getActiveEditor();
						if (editor instanceof XSDEditor)
							fEditor = (XSDEditor) editor;
					}
				}
			}
		}
		return fEditor;
	}
